title: Selēnarhia, or, The government of the world in the moon a comical history / written by that famous wit and caveleer of France, Monsieur Cyrano Bergerac ; and done into English by Tho. St Serf, Gent.
author: Cyrano de Bergerac, 1619-1655.
publisher: Printed by J. Cottrel, and are to be sold by Hum. Robinson ...,
notes: Translation of: Histoire comique des états et empires de la lune.
First word of title transliterated from Greek.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
